title: Coronation Street's Daniel 'ruins' Sinead's death by cheating on her again
text:

Next week on Coronation Street, Sinead (Katie McGlynn) will die after suffering on-and-off from cervical cancer for the past few years.



However it all gets too much for Daniel (Rob Mallard) at the beginning of the week as he watches his wife's declining health.



Daniel attempts to stage an early Christmas with the family to help create lasting memories for son Bertie's future.



However Sinead and Daniel become embroiled in a row after he suggests that she isn't well enough to carry on with the dinner.



(Image: PA)



Infuriated that he is trying to make decisions for her, Sinead lashes out and he storms out.

Away from everyone, Daniel stops under the bridge and breaks down in tears and is seen by a worried Bethany.



She hugs him in a desperate bid to comfort him, however he leans in and the pair end up passionately kissing.

(Image: ITV)

Ken is horrified when he walks by and sees their kiss and later furiously reprimands him for what he has done.



Sinead later finds out the truth after discovering Bethany's diary, revealing that she is in love with Daniel and shared a kiss with him.



Initially, Sinead is devastated and Daniel turns on the self-destruct button, downing a bottle of vodka on the streets of Manchester, alone.

Sinead manages to forgive Daniel for what he has done and the pair spend her last few hours together with their son.



In the aftermath of her death, Daniel will struggle to come to terms with his own guilt.



Speaking about how this would change Daniel's character in the long-run, actor Rob said: "He's got the baby to focus on, but in terms of himself there won't be any, because that's the next stage of the story. She's told him all these things and that he needs to forgive himself and all of that but it's all been caught up in the death.

(Image: ITV)

"He has to now unpick all of that and take all the meaning and the messages from what she was saying to him and actually apply them.



"But the trauma and the shock of it, you kind of get away from that as quickly as possible. So there will be, but it will take a bit of time to implement it."



*Sinead's final scenes air on Coronation Street for half an hour on Thursday 24 October and Friday 25 October for an hour
description: Daniel Osbourne will be caught passionately kissing Bethany Platt just days before wife Sinead Tinker's death, leaving his family disgusted
